name: Alby, the Albino Bat
overview: Alby was 5th place in the 2018 NOMAM BASIC 10-liner contest, in which all submissions have to be complete with 10 lines or less of BASIC code. Gameplay is similar to "Flappy bird" style games, in which you maneuver Alby from screen to screen, flapping to avoid stalactites and stalagmites.
